review: I used to use my laptop to stream Amazon Prime and Netflix on my TV  using an hdmi cord.  I switched to the firebox and the steaming quality is much better and less buffering time than using my laptop.I have only had it for a few weeks but so far it works great. Can easily listen to Prime Music, watch Prime tv and movies, and use the Netflix app. The remote also works well and the voice commands work well in Amazon, I have not had a chance to try them in the Netflix app yet.

review: Amazon, you've done it again !!! I continue to be impressed and pleased with the company and products. From the packaging, and the great price that I purchased this at, I couldn't be happier. I feel confident in knowing "if" I were to have an issue, Amazon would be right there to help me out every step of the way. I know over time, updates and add-ons of channels & features will be added, so the Fire TV will just continue to grow with me. I mean, look how many years the Apple TV has had updates and improvements ! Amazon, you rock ! I'm very happy to consider myself a loyal customer with the company !
